title: Migrate some ObservableFields to LiveDatas.
message:
Migrate some ObservableFields to LiveDatas.

When to use ObservableFields:
* when they are referenced from xml for databinding
When to use LiveData:
* all other cases (of notifying the activity/fragment to update the ui).

I prefer LiveData over ObservableField when possible because:
* LiveData observers will only be triggered when the activity is resumed
* The observers can directly be lambdas: no need for the `BindingCallbackAdapter` workaround.
* Don't need to explicitly unregister the observers in `onDestroy()`

title: Ugly hack using reflection to fix long espresso tests.
message:
Ugly hack using reflection to fix long espresso tests.

Since espresso 3.x, the `RootViewPicker` class waits until the root view in question becomes available, with a timeout backoff. We have tests that expect to NOT find a root view, and every time this check was being performed, it took over 60 seconds for espresso to finally give up and tell us that the root view wasn't found.

The workaround is to use reflection on the `WindowManager` class to count the number of root views.

title: Fix issue with play button being disabled during espresso tests:
message:
Fix issue with play button being disabled during espresso tests:

Scenario:
* Open the MainActivity
 - Tts is initialized
 - ReaderFragment is notified and disables the play button (because there's no text)
* Close the MainActivity, but not the app
* Clear the shared preferences without killing the app (this might only be possible from tests)
* Open the MainActivity
 - Tts is still initialized from before, but no event is published for this
 - ReaderFragment isn't notified, so the play button isn't disabled.

The fix is to publish OnTtsInitialized as a sticky event, so when an activity starts, it can be notified of the initialization, even if it was initialized a while ago.

Scenario:
* open settings
* change the theme setting
  - The activity stack is recreated
* turn on the Wotd setting

* tap on the Wotd notification
